subject: Communication
title: Cicero and the Five Canons of Rhetoric
description: A fast breakdown of Cicero and the Five Canons of Rhetoric for builders.

hook.text: Roman senator Cicero turned Greek theory into a practical system that speakers still use today.

buildup.text: He outlined five canons: invention, arrangement, style, memory, and delivery.

discovery.text: Invention is finding your argument. Arrangement is structuring it. Style is choosing your words.

punchline.text: Great speeches aren't just written well. They're built.
